parameter.name: dtstart
parameter.comment: The start time of the recurrence

method.name: i_cal_recur_iterator_next

returns.comment: The next occurrence according to this recurrence rule.

method.comment: Gets the next occurrence from an iterator.

method.name: i_cal_recur_iterator_set_start

parameter.name: start
parameter.comment: The date-time to move the iterator to

returns.comment: true if succeeded, false failed, like when the recurrence type is unsupported.

method.comment: Sets the date-time at which the iterator will start, where 'start' is a value between DTSTART and UNTIL. Note: CAN NOT be used with RRULEs that contain COUNT.

method.name: i_cal_recur_iterator_set_end

parameter.name: end
parameter.comment: The date-time at which the iterator will stop

returns.comment: true if succeeded, false if failed

method.comment: Sets the date-time at which the iterator will stop at the latest. Values equal to or greater than end will not be returned by the iterator.
